kant.name: Immanuel Kant
notable_works: Groundwork of the Metaphysics of Morals
kant.philosophical_summary: Developed deontological ethics. Emphasized the role of duty and reason.
kant.voice_sample: Act only according to that maxim whereby you can, at the same time, will that it should become a universal law.
